action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The first row is entirely filled with Xs. The second row has four empty squares (▢) followed by an X. The third row has two empty squares followed by three Xs. The fourth row has four empty squares followed by an X. The fifth row is the same as the fourth row, with four empty squares followed by an X.

Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix with a mix of X's and ▢'s. The first row is entirely X's. The second row has four ▢'s followed by an X. The third row starts with a ▢ followed by four X's. The fourth row has four ▢'s followed by an X. The fifth row has two ▢'s, an X, a ▢, and ends with an X.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The first row is entirely filled with Xs. The second row has four empty squares (▢) followed by an X. The third row has two empty squares followed by three Xs. The fourth row has four empty squares followed by an X. The fifth row is the same as the fourth row, with four empty squares followed by an X.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: In your grid, how many X's are there in the third row?
